thread.title: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons
thread.title_full: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons

title: Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons
text:
> Top News Big man Andre Drummond on the spot for young Pistons Detroit Pistons guard Reggie Jackson (1) shoots under Indiana Pacers center Ian Mahinmi (28) during the first half of a preseason NBA basketball game in Indianapolis, Tuesday, Oct. 13, 2015. (AP Photo/Michael Conroy)
